column1: Baby Barnaby's////Visiting from Arizona.... but a Texas native
column2: this place makes me miss home. I remember going here many years ago
column3: and the breakfast is just as good now as it was then. Had the breakfast plate
column5: but the highlight for me was the grits... Oh how I miss grits
column7: wash this all done with fresh and cold grapefruit juice. This is what I miss most about Texas
column8: the food and the people. A local restaurant with great customer service and food which have remained a consistent cornerstone in Houston.
